overview: The explosive documentary from Black Channel Films daring to ask the question "Is it still just racism or is it a race war?"  NOW IS THE TIME TO ASK IS IT STILL JUST "RACISM"  OR IS IT A RACE WAR?  RACE WAR IS THE FIRST DOCUMENTARY IN HISTORY THAT EXAMINES EVERY LEVEL OF AMERICAN SOCIETY TO EXPLORE THE MOST EXPLOSIVE ISSUE FACING AMERICA ALL OF OUR YESTERDAYS . . . AND TOMORROW.
title: Race War
